selectWorld.backupWarning.experimental: Minecraft hast did detect an unknown presence in this ordinary. T is did advise yond thee DOTH NOT PASSETH THIS SCREEN. Ignoring this warning may result in strange occurrences and/'r encounters. Recall, stare not directly at the bugs.
selectWorld.warning.experimental.title: Unknown Entity Err'r
selectWorld.warning.experimental.questio: Minecraft hast did detect an unknown presence in this ordinary. T is did advise yond thee DOTH NOT PASSETH THIS SCREEN. Ignoring this warning may result in strange occurrences and/'r encounters. Recall, stare not directly at the bugs.
config.page1.title: Page 1
config.page2.title: Page 2
config.page3.title: Page 3
config.page4.title: Page 4
config.page5.title: Page 5
config.page6.title: Page 6
config.sss.title: Sup'r Secret Settings
config.pages.title: Pages
config.sightingChanceConfig.title: Sighting Chance
config.sightingChanceConfig.description: Adjusts the chance of H'robrine appearing.
config.dayDelayConfig.title: Haunting Peize
config.dayDelayConfig.description: Changes the peize f'r how long t doth take f'r H'robrine to start maj'r haunting. (in-game days)
config.ghostDoorConfig.title: Apparition Doors
config.ghostDoorConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine can ope thy doors.
config.ghostMineConfig.title: Apparition Collier
config.ghostMineConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall mine next to thee in strip mines.
config.creepingConfig.title: Creeping Mechanic
config.creepingConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall standeth behind thee waiting f'r thee to turn 'round.
config.stalkingConfig.title: Stalking Mechanic
config.stalkingConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall stalk thee from a distance.
config.poofingTorchesConfig.title: Disappearing Torches
config.poofingTorchesConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall tryeth to breaketh thy torches once thee leaveth the area (one check per in-game day.).
config.burningBaseConfig.title: Burning Base
config.burningBaseConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall tryeth to burn down thy house once thee leaveth the area (one check per in-game day.).
config.spotNoiseConfig.title: Sighting Hurtling
config.spotNoiseConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not a hurtling is did play at which hour the common-kissing hedge-pig spots H'robrine.
config.glowingEyesConfig.title: Emissive Layers
config.glowingEyesConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not herobrine shall has't emissive layers. Useful f'r players who is't wanteth to maketh him moo vanilla, 'r yond useth dynamic lighting.
config.herobrineSkinConfig.title: H'robrine Skin
config.lurkingLanguageConfig.title: Lurking Language
config.lurkingLanguageConfig.description: Changes the language yond H'robrine shall useth to communicate with the common-kissing hedge-pig.
config.jumpscareConfig.title: Jumpscare Mechanic
config.jumpscareConfig.description: Enables the ability f'r H'robrine to jumpscare the common-kissing hedge-pig at which hour they receiveth too close.
config.crashConfig.title: Crash Mechanic
config.crashConfig.description: Swaps the jumpscare mechanic f'r the og crash mechanic. [EPILEPSY WARNING!] [not fit f'r weaker machines!] (only worketh at which hour jumpscare is enabl'd.)
config.creepingVanishingDelayConfig.desc: Changes how long t doth take f'r H'robrine to disappear after being hath caught creeping up on the common-kissing hedge-pig.
config.stalkingVanishingDelayConfig.desc: Changes how long t doth take f'r H'robrine to disappear after being hath caught stalking the common-kissing hedge-pig.
config.noSleepConfig.title: Nay Catch But a Wink
config.noSleepConfig.description: Toggles whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall prevent thee from sleeping at which hour he's nearby. (will not worketh on peaceful.)
config.dreadfulDonationConfig.title: Dreadful Donation
config.dreadfulDonationConfig.descriptio: Toggles whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall leaveth thee gifts in thy chests. (Can befall ere the 3 days passeth 'r a shrine is hath built. One check per in-game day.)
config.crimsonCurseConfig.title: Crimson Beshrew
config.crimsonCurseConfig.description: Toggles whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall changeth thy torches to redstone torches and thy lanterns to soul lanterns. (one check per in-game day.)
config.OGshrineMechanicConfig.title: OG Shrine Mechanic
config.OGshrineMechanicConfig.descriptio: Toggles whe'r 'r not lightning strikes at which hour activating a H'robrine shrine.
config.nightmareMechanicConfig.title: Nightmare Mechanic
config.nightmareMechanicConfig.descripti: Toggles whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall appeareth at the foot of thy sleep chamber at which hour thee catch but a wink.
config.windowWatcherConfig.title: Window Gaze'r
config.windowWatcherConfig.description: Toggles whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall disappear at which hour did view through a window.
config.chilledCandlesConfig.title: Chill'd Candles
config.chilledCandlesConfig.description: Toggles whe'r 'r not H'robrine hast the ability to snuff out the common-kissing hedge-pigs candles.
config.sinisterSignsConfig.title: Sinist'r Signs
config.sinisterSignsConfig.description: Toggles whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall leaveth signs f'r the common-kissing hedge-pig during certain events.
config.sightingSenseConfig.title: Sighting Senseth
config.sightingSenseConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not thy pets shall react at which hour H'robrine is nearby.
config.nameTagConfig.title: Nametag
config.nameTagConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine hast a nametag and how t appears.
config.rekindlingShrineConfig.title: Rekindling Shrine
config.rekindlingShrineConfig.descriptio: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall relight dous'd shrines.
config.advancementsConfig.title: Advancements
config.advancementsConfig.description: Changes whe'r players shall beest reward'd advancements did relate to From The Fog. (ADVANCEMENTS DID GRANT WHILE ENABL'D SHALL BEEST HATH LOST IF 'T BE TRUE DISABLED!!!)
config.fearfulFootstepsConfig.title: Fearful Footsteps
config.fearfulFootstepsConfig.descriptio: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall runneth up behind players creating footsteps.
config.shrineSupriseConfig.title: Shrine Hoyday
config.shrineSupriseConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall appeareth on top of the shrine at which hour did light.
config.lurkingConfig.title: Lurking Mechanic
config.lurkingConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall lurk 'round the common-kissing hedge-pig watching from a very far distance
config.autoConfigDisable.title: Taketh Back Control
config.autoConfigEnable.title: Giveth T Control
config.autoConfig.description: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine can modify the config.
config.hittingThatGriddyConfig.title: Hitting Yond Griddy
config.hittingThatGriddyConfig.descripti: Changes whe'r 'r not H'robrine shall spawn doing the griddy.
config.hoeBrineReturnsConfig.title: Hoebrine Returns
config.hoeBrineReturnsConfig.description: Changes H'robrine back to Hoebrine as a reference to the 'riginal bug yond wouldst occur at which hour the common-kissing hedge-pig would see H;robrine without the resourcepack enabl'd
config.skinLibrary.builtInSkins.title: Skins
config.skinLibrary.defaultSkin.title: Default
config.skinLibrary.classicSkin.title: Classic
config.skinLibrary.blackEyesSkin.title: Black Eyes
config.skinLibrary.entity303Skin.title: Entity 303

config.skinLibrary.zombieSkin.title: Carrion

config.skinLibrary.distortedSkin.title: Dist'rt'd

config.skinLibrary.netherBrineSkin.title: Netherbrine
config.skinLibrary.farlanderSkin.title: Farland'r
config.skinLibrary.theHeadlessSkin.title: The Headless
config.skinLibrary.smileSkin.title: Smileth
watchingSkin.customSkinPack.name: Custom Skins
watchingSkin.customSkin1.name: Custom Skin 1
watchingSkin.customSkin2.name: Custom Skin 2
watchingSkin.customSkin3.name: Custom Skin 3
watchingSkin.customSkin4.name: Custom Skin 4
watchingSkin.customSkin5.name: Custom Skin 5
sign.type4.line3: THIS IS THE PLAYERS USERNAME, CHANGING THIS HAS NO EFFECT.
advancements.ftf.root.title: From The Fog
advancements.ftf.root.description: Thee can't see him, but i gage he can see thee...
advancements.ftf.built_shrine.title: Thee Knoweth Not What Thee Didst...
advancements.ftf.jumpscared.title: Behind Thee...
advancements.ftf.jumpscared.description: Receiveth jumpscar'd by H'robrine f'r the first time.
advancements.ftf.found_herobrine_structu: Discov'r any structure did place by H'robrine.
advancements.ftf.herobrine_griddy.title: WHAT?!
advancements.ftf.be_the_librarian.title: A Light In The Dark...
advancements.ftf.liberty_lantern.title: Holla Liberty.
advancements.ftf.liberty_lantern.descrip: Giveth a lantern to an Allay.
advancements.ftf.dog_growl.title: Thee Well Enow Knave??
advancements.ftf.dog_growl.description: Witness a tam'd wolf growl at H'robrine.
advancements.ftf.have_a_nightmare.title: Just a Lacking Valor Dream... Right?
advancements.ftf.have_a_nightmare.descri: Has't a nightmare f'r the first time.
advancements.ftf.found_logless_tree.desc: Discov'r a tree yond thee didn't chop down.
advancements.ftf.named_dd_item.title: T's Communicating...
advancements.ftf.spotted_herobrine.title: I Shouldst Calleth Kevin!
advancements.ftf.spotted_herobrine.descr: Spot H'robrine f'r the first time.
advancements.ftf.be_comical_bonzo.title: Literally Most Wondrous.
advancements.ftf.ghost_miner.title: WHAT WAST YOND?
advancements.ftf.ghost_miner.description: Encounter H'robrine digging 'round thee while thou art mining.
advancements.ftf.take_gm_torch.title: I'm Gonna Taketh t, Screw Thee!
advancements.ftf.take_gm_torch.descripti: Taketh the torch from the apparition collier.
advancements.ftf.dreadful_donation.title: Who Is't Putteth This Hither?
advancements.ftf.dreadful_donation.descr: Findeth a Dreadful Donation from Herobrine.
Receiveth stalk'd by H'robrine without noticing.
advancements.ftf.survive_3_days.title: Is Someone Following Me?
advancements.ftf.survive_10_days.title: Someone's Following Me...
advancements.ftf.survive_50_days.title: Leaveth Me High-lone.
advancements.ftf.survive_100_days.title: I Has't To Encave.
advancements.ftf.survive_200_days.title: Receiveth Me Out Of H're!
advancements.ftf.found_torch_tunnel.titl: I shall not venture down yon path.
advancements.ftf.found_torch_tunnel.desc: Forsooth, to discover a tunnel dug by Herobrine.
chat.cleanup.failure.description: Thither Art Currently Nay H'robrines Load'd In This Ordinary!
This hest activates the creeping mechanic and spawns H'robrine behind the common-kissing hedge-pig t is execut'd on.
This hest activates the stalking mechanic and spawns H'robrine somewh're 'round the common-kissing hedge-pig t is execut'd on. H'robrine may not spawn if 't be true his spawnpoint is did determine to beest in the line of sight another common-kissing hedge-pig.
chat.sighting_summons.nightmare.tutorial: This hest activates the nightmare mechanic and spawns H'robrine at the foot of the sleep chamber of the common-kissing hedge-pig t is execut'd on. H'robrine shall not spawn if 't be true the common-kissing hedge-pig isn't in a sleep chamber
chat.sighting_summons.lurking.tutorial.d: This hest activates the lurking mechanic and spawns H'robrine somewh're off in the distance 'round the common-kissing hedge-pig t is execut'd on. H'robrine may not spawn if 't be true his spawnpoint is did determine to beest within 40 blocks of a common-kissing hedge-pig
